sentences.sContent: "We only have 50 years of observations of the Arctic, " Miller said, referring primarily to satellite sea ice observations.
sentences.sCn: 米勒说：“我们只进行了50年的北极观测，”，他主要指的是卫星进行的海冰观测。

sentences.sContent: "We are inside a mountain in the Arctic because we wanted a really, really safe place that operates by itself, " Fowler said.
sentences.sCn: 福勒说：“我们选址于北极的山里，因为我们希望是它一个非常、非常安全的，可以自己“制冷”的地方。”

sentences.sContent: A segment of bird deaths in the Arctic, he explained, are strange and, in a way, even comical.
sentences.sCn: 一部分北极地区鸟儿的死亡很奇怪，从另一角度看，甚至是很滑稽的，他解释道。
